text:
Datanyze | Multiple Positions | San Mateo, CA | ONSITE

Datanyze is a small, profitable Silicon Valley startup. Our mission is to empower modern sales and marketing professionals to make smarter data-driven decisions. We have a SaaS platform, API integrations as well as one of the most popular Chrome extensions for sales professionals.

Positions we're hiring for: https://www.datanyze.com/careers

+ Software Engineer

+ Senior UX Designer

+ VP of Sales

+ Sales Development Rep

+ VP of Finance

+ Sr. Customer Success Manager
